name: Succubus Prison
description:
You stand outside a house on the edge of town, dragged there by a couple of guys you can't say no to without getting your kneecaps busted, and told that you were helping them to rob it. It's only three sisters who live there, they said. It's an easy score, they said.

You sneak inside and start searching the rooms, as instructed. It's dark, and even though you don't see anything worth taking, things are going smoothly so far.

Then the screaming starts.


Hide from what's hunting you. Use anything in the house to further your escape.

Every action you take will affect how your story evolves. Do your best to survive.






An Escape-Room Horror Game
Sneak, hide, and use the environment to survive long enough to escape.

Hand-Drawn Art
With beautiful hand-drawn art of the unique characters from a number of guest artists! Do you recognize them all?
